ModSettings.name: Faster Spirits
ModSettings.title: [Unit] Faster Spirits
ModSettings.description:
Faster Spirits (Magic Spirit, Spirit Guardian)
In the original, these units only had 1 movement point (MP), but were incorporeal, which treated tiles as only costing 0.5 MPs.
This effectively allowed them to move 2 tiles per turn.
When transitioned to the remake, they got +1 added to their MPs, but incorporeal was nerfed.
So, the effective movement rates remained the same (while doubling map sizes) - which makes for a very slow game.
To address, this Mod changes their base movements to the following: - Magic Spirit : 2 MPs -> 3 MPs - Guardian Spirit : 2 MPs -> 4 MPs
ModSettings.author: DorianGray
